      • getOSNameNotMacOSX

        public boolean getOSNameNotMacOSX()
        Returns, if the Operating System is not Mac OS X Explanation: In the current combination of OSX 10.10 and Java8_45 there is a bug in the used formula components of the application. The formula component does use a Icon to display the TeXFormula. The icon itself is displayed in a JTextPane(). Working with the above combination of OSX and Java8 a second call of 'new JTextPane()' causes an non-responding application. This seems to be a non-fixed bug in the Java JRE, so this fix is implemented for now.
        Returns:
        false if operating system is Mac OS X; else true
